entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023
